sentences.en: A bumper harvest is in sight.
A bumper wheat harvest is anticipated [ expected ] this year.
sentences.cn: 今年小麦 可望 获得丰收.

sentences.en: Farmers have reported a bumper crop this year.
sentences.cn: 据报道今年庄稼大丰收.

sentences.en: Hey, I know what, I'll get a bumper sticker printed up.
sentences.cn: 嘿，有了，我会找人印刷一些保险杠贴纸。

sentences.en: In the state of Iowa, it's been a bumper year for corn.
sentences.cn: 艾奥瓦州今年玉米大丰收。

sentences.en: One of my grocery bags was still precariously perched on the car bumper.
sentences.cn: 我的一只食品杂货物袋还摇摇欲坠地搭在汽车保险杠上。

sentences.en: Part of the car's bumper had come adrift.
sentences.cn: 汽车的保险有一处松动了.

sentences.en: Signs of merry life could be seen everywhere after the bumper harvest.
sentences.cn: 丰收以后到处可以看到一片欢乐景象.

sentences.en: Sydney drank a bumper of the punch he had made , and laughed.
sentences.cn: 西德尼喝下一大杯自己调的五味酒, 笑了.

sentences.en: The painting represents the scene of a bumper harvest.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘了丰收的景象.

sentences.en: There is hope of a bumper harvest.
This year we have a bumper harvest in grain.
We hope readers will enjoy this bumper issue of ‘Homes and Gardens’.
sentences.cn: 我们希望读者会喜欢这一期特大号的《家园》。

sentences.en: We overcame the natural disaster and got in a bumper harvest.
sentences.cn: 我们战胜了自然灾害并获得了丰收.

sentences.en: When I pulled out of the space, I nicked the rear bumper of the car in front of me.
sentences.cn: 我把车从车位开出来时，蹭到了前面那辆车的后保险杠。

phrases.tran_cn: 前保险杠；前车挡；前缓冲铁

trans.tran_en: a bar fixed on the front and back of a car to protect it if it hits anything
